amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase court-ordered Assisted Outpatient Treatment by $5 million to support the severely mentally ill, allowing them to get treatment in the community without incarceration or hospitalization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 155 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase court-ordered Assisted Outpatient Treatment by $5 million to support the severely mentally ill, allowing them to get treatment in the community without incarceration or hospitalization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A137) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 219 (Roll no. 504).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A137) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 219 (Roll no. 504).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A137) offered by Mr. Murphy (PA).
